title: Head of Marketing Communications, Korea
summary: The Head of Marketing Communications will be a key member of Apple’s Marketing leadership team in Korea...
description: Lead the Apple Korea Marcom team, responsible for planning and driving Apple’s Korea marketing communications across all customer-facing touch points, including advertising, digital / interactive, channel and retail...
key_qualifications: We are looking for an individual who is passionate about the marketing communications work and is outstanding at getting things done. A doer who is hands on and not afraid of the details...
